section.title: Ungauged Catchments
section.para: Presented in this section will be guidance on selection of parameter values for ungauged catchments. In concept, the information will be similar to that presented in the current edition. However, additional information about the validity of parameter values will be presented; for example, figures where the relationship is plotted for Kleemolaâ€™s Kc relationship.
